title: Kitchen: Context
content:
Item Value Briefly Brief description missing. Definition Path ReactiveBBQ.Restaurant.Kitchen View Source Link Kitchen.riddl(1:1) Details The kitchen is where food is prepared" The kitchen bounded context provides the ability for the kitchen staff to interact with orders they are preparing. The kitchen is a client of the orders bounded context and interacts with that context alone for the outstanding orders to be prepared. Everything else that happens in the kitchen is out of scope for the restaurant automation software. Consequently, this bounded context is pretty minimal.
Subject-Verb-Object Statements Kitchen displays orders Order is sent to Kitchen for display Order sends order status changes to Kitchen Kitchen ignores drink items on order Context Map C4Context title C4 Containment Diagram for [Context 'Kitchen'] Enterprise_Boundary(Root,Root,"Context 'Kitchen' is not described.") { System_Boundary(ReactiveBBQ,ReactiveBBQ,"Context 'Kitchen' is not described.") { System_Boundary(Restaurant,Restaurant,"Context 'Kitchen' is not described.") { Boundary(Context 'Kitchen', Context 'Kitchen', "Context 'Kitchen' is not described.") { System(OrderViewer, OrderViewer, "Context 'Kitchen' is not described.") } } } } Types Others ReceiveOrder OrderViewType Adaptors FromOrder Entities OrderViewer Context Index FromOrder: Adaptor OrderViewer: Entity OrderViewerState: State input: Handler OrderViewType: Type ReceiveOrder: Type

title: ReactiveBBQ: Domain
content:
Item Value Briefly Brief description missing. Definition Path ReactiveBBQ View Source Link ReactiveBBQ.riddl(1:1) Details A domain to encapsulate the entire enterprise named Reactive BBQ. It is divided into three subdomains:
Restaurant – handles each of the restaurant locations Back Office – handles all the back office supplies and menus Corporate – handles the corporate web site, marketing, accounting and HR This domain definition is designed to be instructive in the RIDDL language. It uses the case study from the Lightbend Reactive Architecture course as the basis for defining the domain. The course uses a set of interviews with Reactive BBQ employees and customers to define the requirements. This domain specification is a possible result of analyzing that domain: the Reactive BBQ restaurant. Author Name: Reid Spencer Email: reid@reactific.com Organization: Reactific Software LLC Title: President Types Domain Index BackOffice: Domain MenuPlant: Plant Order: Context Corporate: Domain Marketing: Context Restaurant: Domain Customer: Context Customer: Entity input: Handler main: State CustomerId: Type Kitchen: Context FromOrder: Adaptor OrderViewer: Entity OrderViewerState: State input: Handler OrderViewType: Type ReceiveOrder: Type Location: Context Location: Entity LocationState: State LocationHandler: Handler LocationId: Type Loyalty: Context AccruePoints: Command FromPayment: Adaptor name: EventCommandA8n LoyaltyAccount: Entity ActiveState: State foo: Handler InitialState: State foo: Handler Inputs: Handler LoyaltyEvent: Type PointsAccrued: Event PointsRedeemed: Event RedeemPoints: Command LoyaltyId: Type Menu: Context AddItem: Command MakeItemOutOfStock: Command Menu: Entity Amount: Type CorporateItemId: Type MenuState: State MenuHandler: Handler MenuItem: Entity MenuItemState: State MenuItemHandler: Handler MenuItemRef: Type RemoveItem: Command Order: Context Order: Entity OrderState: State foo: Handler OrderId: Type OrderViewerId: Type Payment: Context Paid: Event Pay: Command Payment: Entity PaymentState: State foo: Handler PaymentKind: Type PaymentId: Type Reservation: Context Reservation: Entity reservation: State ofInputs: Handler ReservationValue: Type ReservationId: Type Server: Context Server: Entity ServerHandler: Handler ServerState: State ServerId: Type Table: Context Table: Entity TableHandler: Handler TableState: State TableId: Type
